Flying
When this Vehicle enters, seize The Core. [i](Get {E} or surveil 1. A player with the core seizes it at their upkeep. Unblocked creatures seize the core.)[/i]
Whenever you attack, up to one target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Crew 1
